title: El Pulpo
subtitle: The Octopus
meta_desc: Learn octopus vocabulary in Spanish with audio. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish preschool, ocean animals Spanish, bilingual children books

pages.title: El Pulpo
pages.prompt: A beautiful realistic octopus swimming in clear blue ocean water, tentacles flowing gracefully, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El pulpo tiene ocho brazos.
pages.prompt: A realistic octopus with all eight tentacles spread out on the ocean floor, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El pulpo cambia de color.
pages.prompt: A realistic octopus showing color-changing ability, half red half blue, on coral reef, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El pulpo nada.
pages.prompt: A realistic octopus swimming through blue ocean water using jet propulsion, tentacles trailing, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.

pages.title: El pulpo es inteligente.

pages.title: El pulpo vive en el mar.
pages.footer: The octopus lives in the sea.
pages.prompt: A realistic octopus in its den on a beautiful coral reef, tropical fish swimming nearby, professional underwater photography, landscape orientation, wide 16:9 format, high resolution.
